entry.title: What to do?!
entry.summary: Not sure what to do in Guilds of Gods? The Emperor may have an idea or two... Or twenty. Ask for his wisdom here.

entry.title: Multiple servers and lobby music
entry.summary: The latest GoG update brings support for switching between multiple servers. Currently there are 2 regular servers, and a test world. Handy for if someone is already using the best training spots. Or you just really don't want to share a server with someone. There is also a beautiful new lobby soundtrack, with more music coming soon.

entry.title: Huge map graphics update!
entry.summary: The whole Guilds of Gods world has been updated with new graphics. There are now curves!

entry.title: Woodcutting Calculator!
entry.summary: I've just added a woodcutting calculator to the site, which can tell you how many logs you will need to chop to reach your target XP or level. Calculators for more skills will be coming in the future.

entry.title: Mining Golems!
entry.summary: You can now come across aggressive golems while mining manually. Read on for the full patch notes...
entry.content:
• Mining without camps gives your adventurer a chance to come across an agressive golem.
  • If you are successful in slaying a golem, you may be rewarded with powerful rock artifacts.
  • Thread rock artifacts to obtain necklaces with special effects while mining.
  • There are two new teleports to Bodiam and Hyrill (southern cities).
  • New special areas added.

entry.title: Graphics comparison
entry.summary: I've created some comparisons of the new and old Guilds of Gods map graphics. Check them out here.

entry.title: Guilds of Gods player count tracker
entry.summary: I've just added a player count tracker for Guilds of Gods, which graphs the numbers of players online over time. Hopefully you find it interesting. This is the first proper interactive tool I've added to the site, and I plan on more to come.

entry.title: Player Owned Market Stalls
entry.summary: You can now build market stalls to sell items!

entry.title: Withdraw X
entry.summary: You can now use Withdraw X to take a specific amount of an item from your bank! Handy for skills such as smithing where you need to use a certain number of different ores.

entry.title: Auto log
entry.summary: You will now be logged out after 2 minutes if disconnected from the game while in combat.

entry.title: Guilds of Gods on Itch.io
entry.summary: Guilds of Gods is now available on Itch. The game is the same as on the Guilds of Gods website, but adds a handy button in the bottom right to allow you to play in full screen mode. Give it a go here.

entry.title: Guild of Gods - where to cut Oak Trees
entry.summary: I've put together a short guide detailing the best places to cut Oaks. Whether you're looking for trees that are close to a bank, or trees that are close together to cut with a lumber camp, it should have you covered. Take a look here

entry.title: Quick tip
entry.summary: I've just added a quick tip about incinerating noted items which will hopefully save people some time. Take a look here.

entry.title: Introducing EzPz GoG!
entry.summary: I have started work on guides for Guilds of Gods. First up is Woodcutting, check it out here

entry.title: Best woodcutting locations and responsive tables
entry.summary: I've just added a guide with the best place to cut regular trees. Guides for other tree types will be coming soon. I've also made some CSS tweaks to make tables responsive. Some tables in the woodcutting guide were rather large, and causing mobile page to get stretched. They will now scroll instead.

entry.title: Massive GoG update!
entry.summary: A huge new update has just been released, bringing an underground map with caves and dungeons to explore, 60 new items, and the first minigame. Read on for the full patch notes.
entry.content:
Full update notes:

  • Underground Map, First Boss, First Minigame - Sat Mar 30 2019
  • The map now has an underground layer! Many caves to expore.
  • 60 new items, including new unique rare loots.
  • New creature classes; ogres, sea creatures, wolves and others.
  • Obelisk minigame! Defeat and defend from ever increasing waves, the longer your team lasts, the greater the loot.
  • New necklace slot, tools, weapons, armor and tier 5 cloth.
  • Holiday items appear again when worn.
  • Item bags now give a warning when binding an item.
  • Image cache issues fixed. *
